2096190.name: Temporian Tale
2096190.description:
Temporian Tale is a linear action-adventure game. As you progress through the story, you will have to obtain new gear around the world and in monster filled caverns to aid you on your quest.

Features

  • Four unique areas for you to conquer on your quest.
  • At least 5 unique items for you to obtain.
  • At least 15 unique enemies and 5 unique bosses.
  • Minimal instructions with a simple control scheme.
  • Various secret areas containing small goodies to aid you on your journey.
